page.title: 05LANGHOLM SHOPS
page.content: ALTHOUGH{LANGHOLM}IS A SMALL TOWN, TRADE IN GENERAL IS BRISK. {FOOD SHOPS}__IN LANGHOLM HIGH STREET THERE IS ONE WELL STOCKED SUPERMARKET AND THE OTHER THREE GROCERS ARE IN FACT GENERAL STORES.ONE GREENGROCER ALSO SELLS HEALTH FOODS.THE THREE LOCAL BAKERS ARE WELL PATRONISED AND THE TWO FAMILY BUTCHERS ARE VERY BUSY. {GENERAL SHOPS}__A CHEMIST SHOP AND HEALTH CENTRE WORK IN CONJUNCTION WITH EACH OTHER TO SERVE THE COMMUNITY.TWO NEWSAGENTS AND ONE LOCAL NEWSPAPER KEEP THE TOWN'S PEOPLE WELL INFORMED ABOUT CURRENT AFFAIRS.A LARGE IRONMONGER AND FURNITURE SHOP ALSO TRADES ON THE HIGH STREET. THERE IS EVEN AN ANTIQUE SHOP AND ONE SHOP DEALS IN STAMPS,COINS AND FLY_TYING. {WOOLLEN SHOPS}__THERE ARE WOOLLEN AND TWEED MILLS IN LANGHOLM AND TWO SHOPS SELL THEIR MERCHANDISE.
